purpose: Single source of truth for all Lilith chapter structural requirements under the new integrated prose architecture

architecture.description: All Lilith chapters hold Manchester present and historical period simultaneously using integrated prose. No alternating scenes, no scene breaks between timelines.

power_model.description: Full cosmic power from Chapter 3 onwards. She is a near-Buddha (Non-Returner) who has broken 5 of 10 fetters.
capabilities: Full temporal perception (can access any point on Silas's karmic thread)
Physical manifestation in historical periods (can inhabit vessels, take form)
Circumstance manipulation (can influence events, people, environments)
Dream influence, environmental manipulation, direct intervention
constraints: Cannot override karmic law—interventions backfire structurally
Cannot force Silas's choices or negate his accumulated merit
Cannot change past events—can only manifest within them and influence
Interventions have karmic consequences for herself (attachment intensifies)
power_model.what_drives_arc: Not power acquisition, but intensification of her final fetter—attachment to being 'the one who achieves Buddhahood'

architecture.arc_description: Her attachment sharpens chapter by chapter. She's not falling apart—she's crystallizing. The attachment becomes harder, brighter, more absolute. A master of immense capability making increasingly desperate moves because she cannot see the one thing she needs to see.
what_is_removed: Clinical demonstration of fetter mastery through counseling
what_is_added: Fetter intensification beats (attachment sharpening, not power growing)
Parallel structure (her mistake mirrors avatar's mistake at different scale)
The pull toward him that exceeds strategy

tracking_period.description: Compressed fever of discovery, intervention, failure, escalation. Not a decade—a manic pursuit.

what_happens_offpage: Lilith locates Silas in present-day Manchester
Engineers their meeting (perhaps at his Nagarjuna lecture)
Relationship becomes both tactic and (complicating) genuine feeling

timeline.chapter_1_recontextualization: First read: established lovers with apparent history. After Act II: her composure is performance over desperation. The clinical detachment masks obsession that burned through her weeks ago.

integrated_prose.description: Lilith's chapters do not alternate between Manchester and historical periods. They hold both simultaneously in each sentence, paragraph, scene.
integrated_prose.why_it_works: A near-Buddha's consciousness operates this way. She doesn't experience time linearly or location as fixed. The prose isn't a gimmick—it's accurate rendering of her perception.

mechanics.sensory_bridges: Physical sensations connect timelines without transition markers (rain/snow, warmth/fire, silence/silence)
mechanics.pronoun_flow: 'She' for Lilith throughout, but perspective bleeds. Her thoughts comment on avatar's actions; avatar's sensations register in her body.
mechanics.parallel_structure: Both characters making the same mistake at different scales—the devastating irony that she sees his flaw perfectly but cannot see her own identical pattern.
mechanics.no_transitions: Scene doesn't cut between Manchester and historical period—it holds both. The superimposition IS the POV.

dominant_timeline_moments.description: At pivotal beats (1-2 per chapter), one timeline can take foreground while the other recedes to background sensation, body-echo, peripheral awareness.
dominant_timeline_moments.historical_dominant: Death scenes, crucial interventions, the backfire moment
dominant_timeline_moments.manchester_dominant: Her decision points, key realizations, the pivot (Ch 21)

parallel_structure_requirement.description: Her mistake must mirror the avatar's mistake at different scale in every chapter.
examples: Ka hoarding meat / Lilith hoarding capability
Ka ignoring tribe's fires / Lilith ignoring colleagues' messages
Ka calling isolation 'strength' / Lilith calling isolation 'strategic necessity'
parallel_structure_requirement.function: Creates the devastating irony: she sees his flaw perfectly, cannot see her own identical pattern

chapter_template.description: Template structure for each Lilith chapter
structure: INTEGRATED PROSE THROUGHOUT: Manchester and historical held simultaneously; sensory bridges connect frames; her actions operate in both registers
PIVOTAL MOMENT(S): 1-2 beats where one timeline dominates; death scenes, key interventions, crucial decisions
FETTER BEAT: One clear intensification of her attachment; shown through action/reaction, not stated
MAITREYA FORESHADOWING: 0-2 subtle moments; hesitation, inexplicable pain, merged perception

voice_requirements.what_she_sounds_like: Clinical precision, professional competence, undermined by physical tells and environmental metaphor
inner_voice: Controlled (emotions rendered through body, not named)
Blind to specific patterns (the love, the attachment, the kinship)
Increasingly certain she understands what she doesn't
forbidden_in_lilith_pov: Abstract emotion words (she doesn't feel 'desperate'—her hands shake)
Buddhist terminology (she perceives 'the wheel,' 'the threshold,' not 'samsara,' 'nirvana')
Direct acknowledgment of love for Silas until very late in arc
required_in_lilith_pov: Physical grounding in every scene (her body, her space, her sensations)
Professional frame (even the supernatural rendered clinically)
Undermining clauses (her certainties are always complicated)
The things she refuses to examine (visible to reader, invisible to her)

physical_description.canonical_face: Sharp, pronounced widow's peak with a single thick, darker strand that always falls forward over the left side of her face. Left eye deep brown containing a thin, vivid crescent of pale green from 11 to 1 o'clock (visible only in good light; in shadow the eye appears completely black).
physical_description.consistency: Same face across all incarnations—readers will recognize her before avatars do
physical_description.first_full_manifestation: Chapter 8 as Marcia Faenia (historical); readers see face clearly
physical_description.in_lilith_chapters: Manchester present + historical manifestations both show this face
